title: Chat restricted for what?
body:
Chat restricted for this? What the hell? So we can't even say anything in game anymore? Are you serious. Far out. I thought being passively chatting would be ok. but like apparently you can get chat bans for this as well. Seems kinda fair aye?! :D Yeah not really...

An honest reply to this post would be appreciated, cause I can't see it.

replies.body:
Spamming, insulting your teammates, threatening to report, threatening to afk

If you behave like this frequently, that's why you were punished. If you want to call your friend a pussy, I'd advise using private chat. If you think this is acceptable behavior, you are wrong and your next punishments will escalate, ultimately into a permanent ban.

I'm going for now, so if you want to discuss this at length I'd suggest posting it on the [**NA Player Behavior & Moderation board**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation).
spamming, and abuse "you are literally as smart as a piece of dirt" "Did you play the tutorial, cause you are mmmmm"
Yeah Im calling them good, MMmmm, means nice :D Ahahahha,
